name: Classic Ping Pong
description:
This game is just a classic ping pong game. Nothing fancy or new.

There is a lot of these games out there, and this game has nothing new to  add to the table. But I mainly made this to build a portfolio. So I shared it here to have a place for my games, and maybe some of you want to play it and give me feedback :-)

The game is very simple. It is a simple AI with a 3 difficulties.

Difficulties:

  • Ez
  • Harder than ez
  • Mad lad

I might update it, and extend it to improve it. But right now it is a complete ping pong game.
